thread.title: E-Book Sales Weaken Amid Higher Prices
thread.title_full: E-Book Sales Weaken Amid Higher Prices - WSJ

author: Jeffrey A. Trachtenberg
title: E-Book Sales Weaken Amid Higher Prices
text:
When the world’s largest publishers struck e-book distribution deals with Amazon.com Inc. over the past several months, they seemingly got what they wanted: the right to set the prices of their titles and avoid the steep discounts the online retail giant often applies.
But in the early going, that strategy doesn’t appear to be paying off. Three big publishers that signed new pacts with Amazon—Lagardere SCA’s Hachette Book Group, News... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
